brand_identity.name: GravelMatch
brand_identity.vibe: The grit of the trail meets the fluidity of modern connection. Think 'Rapha' meets 'Tinder' in a dark forest.
brand_identity.archetype: The Explorer (Freedom, Discovery) + The Lover (Connection, Intimacy)

typography.usage_rules: Headings must be punchy and tight. Use Chivo Mono for data points (distance, elevation, dates). Never use pure white text on black; use Zinc-100 or Zinc-200.

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")
textures.topo: Use the topographic map image as a low-opacity (5%) overlay on the main background.

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first. Use 'grid-cols-1' for mobile, 'md:grid-cols-12' for desktop. Gaps should be generous (gap-6 or gap-8).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-glow transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold tracking-wide uppercase text-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-100 hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium text-sm
buttons.ghost: text-zinc-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.profile_swipe: relative h-[70vh] w-full rounded-3xl overflow-hidden shadow-2xl border border-white/10. Image covers full height. Gradient overlay at bottom for text readability.
cards.route_card: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors rounded-xl p-4 flex flex-col gap-3 group
cards.stat_box: bg-zinc-900/30 border border-zinc-800/50 rounded-lg p-3 flex flex-col items-center justify-center

inputs.default: bg-zinc-950/50 border border-zinc-800 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-zinc-100 placeholder:text-zinc-600 transition-all

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-6 left-4 right-4 h-16 bg-zinc-900/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-full flex items-center justify-around shadow-2xl z-50
navigation.top_bar: sticky top-0 w-full h-16 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5 flex items-center justify-between px-4 z-40

gestures.swipe: Use Framer Motion for swipe gestures. Threshold: 100px. Rotation: 5deg on drag.

image_urls.map_style: Dark mode map tiles (e.g., Mapbox Dark or CartoDB Dark Matter) with Primary Color route lines.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use lighter grays (Zinc-300) on dark backgrounds, never dark gray.
accessibility.labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Theme: Force dark mode in Tailwind config or HTML class. The app is dark-first.
3. Layout: Implement the 'Bottom Navigation' pattern for mobile views. It's critical for the 'Tinder' feel.
4. Swipe Logic: Build a robust swipe component for the 'Discover' page. It's the core feature.
5. Maps: Use a placeholder image or a simple Leaflet/Mapbox integration for the 'Route' view. Style it dark.
6. AI Feature: Use a 'Sparkles' icon and a special gradient border (Brand Gradient) for AI-suggested routes.
7. Auth: Create a sleek login screen with a full-screen background image (Hero Background) and glassmorphism forms.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
